description: Connect to Bluesky and interact with the ATProtocol using natural language. Fetch, analyze, and post content seamlessly within your LLM applications. Enhance your experience by leveraging Bluesky's features directly in your context window.

blueskyServiceUrl.description: The URL of the Bluesky service (e.g., https://bsky.social)

capabilities.name: get-my-handle-and-did
capabilities.description: Return the handle and did of the currently authenticated user for this blusesky session. Useful for when someone asks information about themselves using "me" or "my" on bluesky.

capabilities.name: get-timeline-posts
capabilities.description: Fetch your home timeline from Bluesky, which includes posts from all of the people you follow in reverse chronological order

capabilities.name: create-post
capabilities.description: Create a new post on Bluesky

capabilities.name: get-profile
capabilities.description: Get a user's profile from Bluesky

capabilities.name: search-posts
capabilities.description: Search for posts on Bluesky

capabilities.name: get-post-thread
capabilities.description: Get a full conversation thread for a specific post, showing replies and context

capabilities.name: convert-url-to-uri
capabilities.description: Convert a Bluesky web URL to an AT URI format that can be used with other tools

capabilities.name: search-people
capabilities.description: Search for users/actors on Bluesky

capabilities.name: search-feeds
capabilities.description: Search for custom feeds on Bluesky

capabilities.name: get-liked-posts
capabilities.description: Get a list of posts that the authenticated user has liked

capabilities.name: get-trends
capabilities.description: Get current trending topics on Bluesky

capabilities.name: like-post
capabilities.description: Like a post on Bluesky

capabilities.name: follow-user
capabilities.description: Follow a user on Bluesky

capabilities.name: get-pinned-feeds
capabilities.description: Get the authenticated user's pinned feeds and lists.

capabilities.name: get-feed-posts
capabilities.description: Fetch posts from a specified feed

capabilities.name: get-list-posts
capabilities.description: Fetch posts from users in a specified list

capabilities.name: get-user-posts
capabilities.description: Fetch posts from a specific user

capabilities.name: get-follows
capabilities.description: Get a list of users that a person follows

capabilities.name: get-followers
capabilities.description: Get a list of users that follow a person

capabilities.name: get-post-likes
capabilities.description: Get information about users who have liked a specific post

capabilities.name: list-resources
capabilities.description: List all available MCP resources with their descriptions
